globalProperty.description: Directory containing the PCSLabInterface queue items. This will contain HL7 text files submitted by LIMS. These items are awaiting processing to be placed in the HL7 queue.

Directory containing the PCSLabInterface archive items. This will contain HL7 text files that have been submitted by LIMS and then processed sucessfully into the HL7 queue. Certain date parameters will be replaced with the current date: %Y = four digit year %M = two digit month %D = two digit date of the month %w = week of the year %W = week of the month
